metadata.Title: CVE-2023-48014 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: GPAC v2.3-DEV-rev566-g50c2ab06f-master was discovered to contain a stack overflow via the hevc_parse_vps_extension function at /media_tools/av_parsers.c.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
